'''Mt. Yougou Night Walk Red Kitsune Doll''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of Mt. Yougou Night Walk Red Kitsune Doll is obtained after completing the quest ''[[Pen Pals, Book Reviews, and the Super Lucky General]]'' during the [[Hues of the Violet Garden]] event.
